The Conversation, 2011 Australia. Quartz Media, 2012 New York City, USA. Medium, 2012 USA. The Intercept, 2014 USA. Vox, 2014 New York, USA. Newspapers, AU, News Agencies The Associate Press Agency, 1917 New York City, USA. The Associate Press News, 1917 New York City, USA. Reuters Agency, 1851 London, UK. Reuters News, 1851 London, UK. Bloomberg, L.P. (Limited partnership), 1981 New York, USA. Economic Cornner Some of the above news sources are as much economics as any serious academic papers. Additionally there are some institutes which conduct their own research and give newsletters to your inbox which could be worth the watch. It also depends upon your area of interest within the broad platter of economics. Blogosphere Marginal Revolution, 2003 Tyler Cowen and Alex Tabarrok, George Mason University. Five Thirty Eight, 2008, Nate Silver, owned by ESPN (ABC Media) since 2012. Greg Mankiw’s Blog, 2006. Macromusings, 2007 David Beckworth. Conversable Economist, 2011 Timothy Taylor. Naked Capitalism, 2006 various authors. Econbrowser, 2005 by Hamilton and Chinn. New Economic Perspectives, 2007.
